fields.areaDescription: To obtain and retain a work force whose characteristics are in accordance with the company's objectives, through adequate recruitment, selection, training and development programs.
Applications development Creation and maintenance of applications on the company's website.

fields.title: Controller Finance
fields.jobDescription: Control and supervision of the economic management of the company.
fields.responsabilities: Prepare and monitor the annual budget, coordinate audits and communicate the company's financial situation to senior management to facilitate financial decision making.

fields.title: Risk management specialist
fields.jobDescription: Study, analysis and control of the risk of the company's shares.
fields.responsabilities: Diagnose business liquidity, indebtedness or problems that may arise from poor financial management.

fields.title: Human Resources officer
fields.jobDescription: Develop and implement policies related to the effectiveness of the organization's personnel.
fields.responsabilities: Promote company values such as equality and diversity, manage payroll, interpret employment laws, dealing with grievances and implementing disciplinary files.

fields.title: Recruitment Researcher
fields.skills: Good command of social networks, good domain infojobs.
fields.abilities: It requires being up to date in terms of the use of the Internet and social networks in terms of Human Resources.

fields.title: Django Developer
fields.responsabilities: Creation and maintenance of applications on the company's website.
fields.skills: Experience working in Agile/Scrum teams Advanced or fluent English (B1) Management of Django Management of Python (Desirable) Management of JavaScript (Desirable) Use of Docker.
fields.abilities: Full Stack Developer with experience in the web and the Django framework.
fields.knowledge: Experience working in Agile/Scrum teams Advanced or fluent English (B1) Management of Django Management of Python (Desirable) Management of JavaScript (Desirable) Use of Docker.

fields.title: Django developer required
fields.responsabilities: Support the development of research projects carried out by the company.

fields.companyDescription: We are a team that provides development of mobile and web application ecosystems accompanied by a backend with high technology and security tools, tailored to the client and with a business architecture that lasts over time.
fields.idealCandidate: HTML / CSS / JS. Python programming language and Django Framework. PostgreSQL Database, MySQL. Rest/Soap API services. Git version control. Agile Scrum methodologies.
fields.jobDescription: Design and develop software projects participating in the definition of requirements, adjusting to times and standards of quality and work of the organization.
